caption.title: Predicted number of pine dwelling forest birds present in 10x10-km UTM grid cells according to the minimum proportion of natural pine forest under different management and climate scenarios.
caption.p: Red line: current observed mean; blue line: predictions under the current climate and after the first step of the naturalization management action; blue dotted lines indicate the 95% confidence intervals; grey lines: predictions under climate change models and after the first step of the naturalization management action; black lines: predictions under the MRI-CGCM3 global change model (RCP4.5 and RCP8.5) and after the first step of the naturalization management action; green line: predictions under the MRI-CGCM3 global change model (RCP 4.5 and RCP8.5) after the two steps of naturalization.
